text: Allah atulwisye ngani jambone nnope (jajili) Chitabu (cha Qur’an) chakulandana-landana soni chakuwilisya-wilisya. Mapende ga aŵala ŵaakun’jogopaga M’mbuje gwao (Allah) gakasajilijitikaga najo, kaneka ni gakasatependalaga mapende gao ni mitima jao ku yakunkumbuchila Allah, chele ni chongoko cha Allah akasan’jongolaga nacho jwansachile. Sano jwaakunnechelelaga Allah kusokonechela, basi nganakola nkun’jongola
